name: Auto Update Device Models in Monday.com

parameters.command: =powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$serial = '{{ $json.serialNumber }}'; $cc = $serial.Substring($serial.Length - 4); Invoke-WebRequest \"https://support-sp.apple.com/sp/product?cc=$cc\" | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Content | Out-String | Write-Output"
